actions.text: Referred to House Committee on the Judiciary.

official_title: A bill to provide penalties for assaulting a member of the National Guard while he is engaged in carrying out official duties.

summary.text: Provides that anyone forcibly resisting, opposing or assaulting a member of the National Guard while he is engaged in carrying out his official duties shall be fined $15,000 or imprisoned not more than twenty-five years, or both.

titles.title: A bill to provide penalties for assaulting a member of the National Guard while he is engaged in carrying out official duties.
